title: Memoirs of A Gigolo Volumes 1-4
description: Olivier Adair. Beautiful on the outside, damaged on the inside. One bad decision followed by another leaves him broke and out of options. When propositioned to sell his body, he enters a parallel world of sex for hire. Oliver embarks on a journey that will force him to confront his demons, answer for the sins of the past and become a man. These are his intimate thoughts.
author: Livia Ellis
